descriptionHtml:
Since there are so many Nightingale mods but no rings, I thought I\'d create one.
It\'s a retextured Ring of Namira. It won\'t make any changes to the Ring of Namira, nor will it have the cannibalism ability.

I tried to match it with [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5247]Sunnie\'s Craftable and Enchantable Nightingale Set[/URL], meaning it requires ebony ingots and void salts to craft. It is fully enchantable.

Installation:
Extract to your Skyrim folder

Uninstallation:
Delete the following files:
Data/NightingaleRing.esp
Data/meshes/armor/amuletsandrings/nightingale/nightingalering.nif
Data/meshes/armor/amuletsandrings/nightingale/nightingaleringgo.nif
Data/meshes/armor/amuletsandrings/nightingale/nightingaleringright.nif
Data/textures/armor/amuletsandrings/nightingale/nightingalering.dds

Mods used in screenshots:  [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3765]AlphaDragoon\'s Nightingale Hi-res Retex with Torn Scarf and Variants[/URL]
author: dukefx
